header.name: Annika Fuhge
header.title: Frontend Developer
header.quote: I love to be creative, to organize myself, and to work in a team. My personal development is very important to me, therefore, I am eager and willing to learn new skills.

cgm.title: Frontend Developer
cgm.description: Further development of the cloud-based dental software “CGM XDENT”.

ecostag.title: Frontend Developer
ecostag.description: Development of a ticketing platform with focus on the promoter area. Collaboration with Future Demand on the integration of their AI-based services e.g. for the creation of marketing campaigns.

douglas.title: Frontend Developer
douglas.description: Development of international CRM products including 360° view of the customer and POS frontends incl. communication with POS system (mobile device & terminal). Moderation of SCRUM events. Substitution for the product owner.

tu-dortmund-wimi.title: Research Assistant
tu-dortmund-wimi.description: Development of Domain Specific Languages (DSLs) incl. model transformation with MPS, further development of existing DSLs with focus on UI/UX.

tu-dortmund.title: Student/Scientific Assistant
tu-dortmund.description: Further development of DSLs through views, validation, and user-friendly design.

master.title: Master of Science in Computer Science

bachelor.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
bachelor.description: Graphic modeling of Cinco product specifications

cgm.1: Fixing bugs within the "CGM XDENT" dental software.

stagedates.1: Responsible for the integration of new API interfaces for a ticketing platform in close compliance with specified design guidelines.
stagedates.2: Integration of a third-party system (Future Demand) for the use of AI-based services.
stagedates.3: Responsible for the development and maintenance of a component library.

cc.1: Refactoring of the customer data platform and integration of new features.
cc.2: Implementation of end-to-end tests and mockups.

pos.1: Refactoring and development of new features for the stationary and mobile POS, with a special focus on communication with the POS system.
pos.2: Mainly responsible for the implementation of the mobile POS and its quality assurance through end-to-end tests.

ui.1: Development of a cross-project component library and its use in day-to-day business.

cinco.1: Development and creation of jUnit tests of a generator-driven development framework for domain-specific graphical modelling tools.
cinco.2: Development of graphical DSLs to replace textual DSLs.
cinco.3: Use of the framework to model form-based processes in a web application.

cv.description: Web application that includes the personal CV. Users can customise both the theme and the language. The CV can also be downloaded as a PDF.

cloudy.description: Weather app with a special focus on the glass morphism design.

tic.description: The Tic Tac Toe game offers a modern design, which was previously created in Figma.

todo.description: This ToDo application was developed for practice purposes to deepen the basic and to experiment with theming and drag & drop.

blog.description: This Bridgerton inspired blog serves as a practice project with Vue.js.

bookstoreUI.description: Web application with Angular 19 for managing books. Users can choose the theme themselves. (WIP)

bookstoreBackend.description: A Spring Boot + Kotlin backend for managing books. (WIP)
